short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides risk indicators for potentially infringing products on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you concerned about counterfeit, infringing, or low-quality products on Amazon.com? The Amazon Risk Indicator extension helps you shop more confidently by evaluating potential risks for each product.

Features:

Infringement Detection: Identifies possible counterfeit or unauthorized products based on suspicious keywords and other risk factors.
Seller Assessment: Flags potentially unreliable or new sellers with limited history.
Risk Level Indicator: Displays an easy-to-understand risk level (Safe, Low, Medium, High) directly on the product page.
Detailed Risk Factors: See specific factors that contribute to the risk assessment, including keywords and seller behavior.
Real-Time Analysis: Automatically scans Amazon listings as you browse, providing immediate insights.
Shop Smartly: With the Amazon Risk Indicator, youâ€™ll gain a clearer view of the potential risks before making a purchase, helping you avoid products that may be infringing, counterfeit, or of poor quality.

Currently only available for the US marketplace.
